participant_1.background: My pets name is Charlie. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic. I listen to rap music. I produce music for artists. My favourite food is pizza.

participant_2.background: I enjoy coloring books. I've a German shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. I like to watch NHL hockey. My husband is adopted.
